name: Get Back in the Ring Business! Trijam 215
name_original: Get Back in the Ring Business! Trijam 215
description:
This game was made in 3:20 hours for Trijam 215. The theme was Get back in the ring.

Right click to pick up and left click to put down. You can put the jewelry in the boxes, but can only stack the same color in a single box. When customers arrive, you must pick up the correct jewelry and and click on them. You can carry up to 3 items at once, and you put them down opposite the order you picked them up.

If you sell all the jewelry you win, but if ten or more customers are without their items you lose.

The browser version does not work on mac. Apple users must download the game.

(linux version is untested)
